#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
  int T; scanf("%d", &T);
  for (int cas = 1; cas <= T; ++cas) {
    string s; cin >> s;
    int ret = 1e9;
    for (size_t i = 0; i <= s.size(); ++i) {
      int tmp = 0;
      for (size_t j = 0; j < s.size(); ++j) {
        if (j < i) tmp += s[j] == 'N';
        else tmp += s[j] == 'O';
      }
      ret = min(ret, tmp);
    }
    cout << ret << endl;
  }
  return 0;
}
